nodes.documentation:
Constructor
Variables from inherited contracts
{rate, wallet, token} from Crowdsale.sol
{cap} from CappedCrowdsale.sol
{openingTime, closingTime} from TimedCrowdsale.sol
nodes.name: MaestroCrowdsale

nodes.documentation: Override parent contracts to combine implementation of CappedCrowdsale and TimedCrowdsale
nodes.name: _preValidatePurchase

nodes.documentation:
Override parent contracts
Unlike parent contracts, it does NOT call internal {_deliverTokens} function
{_tokenAmount} does not include bonus
nodes.name: _processPurchase

nodes.documentation: Override from FinalizableCrowdsale to include burning of remaining tokens
nodes.name: finalization

nodes.documentation: Called by token contract for validation
nodes.name: returnTrue
